tool_description: Font hinting (also known as instructing) is the use of mathematical instructions to adjust the display of an outline font so that it lines up with a rasterized grid. At low screen resolutions, hinting is critical for producing clear, legible text. Use this API to integrate font hinting in your workflow.

title: Font Hinting
